name: Weekends
summary: 'Weekends' is the story of a young boy shuffling between the homes of his recently divorced parents. Surreal dream-like moments mix with the domestic realities of a broken up family in this hand animated film set in 1980's Toronto.
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 2017-10-18
  • 导演: Trevor Jimenez
  • 编剧: Trevor Jimenez
  • 时长: 15分钟
  • 地区: 美国
  • 其他: 2017-10-18(华沙电影节) / 2018-04-19(美国)
